email.subject: $P{keyWordCompany}: Forgotten Username Request
email.message:
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE, DO NOT REPLY.
A Compelligence user on your system has forgotten their username


First Name: "$P{FirstName}"

Last Name: "$P{LastName}"

Email: "$P{Email}"

Phone: "$P{Phone}"


Please provide this user with the necessary log-in information.

If you did not expect this message or don't want to receive mails in future, please contact $P{emailOriginalAdmin}.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.
